aka: двое в одной жизни, не считая собаки

cast.name: 斯韦特兰娜·克留奇科娃 Svetlana Kryuchkova
波琳娜·古赫曼 Polina Gukhman

writer.name: 安德烈·扎伊采夫 Andrei Zaitsev

director.name: 安德烈·扎伊采夫 Andrei Zaitsev

this_title: Two People in One Life and a Dog
trans_title: двое в одной жизни, не считая собаки
introduction: A movie about a married couple of elderly intellectuals from St Petersburg. About their wisdom, calmness, optimism, patience and forgiveness. That is, about everything that contemporary people lack. That is why they themselves, their warmth and their house attract those in need of warmth, help and support like fire.
chinese_title: Two People in One Life and a Dog
